amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be provided to Pakistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act for Pakistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A072) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 320 (Roll no. 333).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A072) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A072) Failed by recorded vote: 92 - 320 (Roll no. 333).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
